sub_fields.name: mobile_image

If left blank, the desktop image will be used.
Min. size: 500 x 750

sub_fields.label: Video

sub_fields.instructions: If video added, the image will be displayed while the video loads.

sub_fields.message: The business name, contact email, contact number and social media links will be displayed. These can be updated from the 'General Settings' in the left-hand side menu.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image

sub_fields.message: Choose the appearance of the module. Preview the styles below: Style 1 Style 2 Style 3 Style 4 Style 5

sub_fields.label: Content type
sub_fields.name: content_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose between displaying locations or displaying custom content.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: To be displayed on desktop only

sub_fields.label: Desktop Image
sub_fields.name: desktop_image
sub_fields.instructions: Min. size: 1500 x 700

sub_fields.label: Mobile Image
sub_fields.name: mobile_image
sub_fields.instructions:
If no image is set, desktop image will be used.

Min. size: 500 x 500

sub_fields.message: The most recent 5 posts from the post type selected above will be shown automatically.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Min. size: 400 x 550

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images
sub_fields.instructions: Min. image size: 1400 x 700

sub_fields.message: You can change the lists of benefits or the images shown in this module on the 'CW Options' page in the CMS.

sub_fields.label: Module Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: Choose between displaying all columns at once, or displaying them three at a time in a carousel.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions:
Add a custom image here. If none added then the image set in the Membership Plan's page will be used instead.

Min. size: 500 x 250

sub_fields.label: Price
sub_fields.name: price
sub_fields.instructions: Price excluding currency symbol (e.g. '225')

sub_fields.label: Price details
sub_fields.name: price_details
sub_fields.instructions: e.g. 'per workstation, per month'

sub_fields.label: Link to membership plan page?
sub_fields.name: link_to_memb_plan
sub_fields.instructions:
If set to 'Yes', a button will be added linking to the full Membership Plan page.
If set to 'No', you can then use the 'Button' field below to add a custom button.

sub_fields.label: Intro Video Loading Image
sub_fields.name: intro_video_poster
sub_fields.instructions:
This image displays as the video initially loads.

Min. size: 1000 x 600

sub_fields.label: Testimonials
sub_fields.name: testimonials
sub_fields.instructions: Ensure only testimonials with videos are selected. Testimonials without videos will not be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Client Logo
sub_fields.name: client_logo
sub_fields.instructions: Logo size: 85 x 30

sub_fields.message:
All regions are displayed automatically. A region will need to have a SVG Map added before it is displayed by this module. 

You can add a map from Locations -> Regions.

sub_fields.label: Filter type
sub_fields.name: filter_type
sub_fields.instructions:
If the filter type is set to none, all regions will be displayed at once.

If a filter type is added, the module will instead show locations for a specific region with a filter to change region.

sub_fields.message: Shows an index of all locations with their contact information. Locations are categorised by region.

sub_fields.label: Location
sub_fields.name: location
sub_fields.instructions: All map & contact details will be taken from the location's settings.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Min. size: 250 x 400

sub_fields.label: Location
sub_fields.name: location
sub_fields.instructions: The slider will show meeting rooms for the following location. If on a location page, it will default to that current location.

sub_fields.message: The meeting rooms will automatically be displayed automatically. To edit any meeting room, use the 'Meeting Rooms' section of the CMS.

sub_fields.label: Custom Heading
sub_fields.name: custom_heading
sub_fields.instructions: If a heading is added, the team member's name will appear below the main heading as a subheading instead.

sub_fields.label: External Link
sub_fields.name: external_link
sub_fields.instructions: Optionally link the user out to an external page

sub_fields.label: Distance from office
sub_fields.name: distance
sub_fields.instructions: Enter number in km

sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Min. size: 310 x 450

sub_fields.label: Desk Sizes
sub_fields.name: desk_sizes
sub_fields.instructions: Place office sizes in order from small to large

sub_fields.label: Desk size
sub_fields.name: desk_size
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the number of desks

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Min. size: 300 x 300

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: 140 max characters

sub_fields.label: Cover image
sub_fields.name: cover_image
sub_fields.instructions:
This image will appear as the preview to the virtual tour.

Min. size: 700 x 450

sub_fields.message: Hubspot forms can be managed from 'General Settings' in the left-hand side menu.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: form_text
sub_fields.instructions: Optional further text to explain the form.

sub_fields.label: (copy)
sub_fields.message: The calculator figures for each location are generated by the numbers saved in the 'Cost Calculator' tab for each location.
The bar graph is generated from the information saved under General Settings > Bar Graph.
